text: Valery Fyodorovich Bykovsky (; 2 August 1934 – 27 March 2019) was a Soviet cosmonaut. He flew three manned space mission space flights: Vostok 5, Soyuz 22, and Soyuz 31. He was also backup for Vostok 3 and Soyuz 37. Bykovsky was born in Pavlovsky Posad, Soviet Union. Bykovsky died on 27 March 2019 at the age of 84.Ушёл Валерий Быковский — космонавт, на которого не действовала невесомость ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cosmonauts
title: Valery Bykovsky
